p: To evaluate substitution rates, we undertook Bayesian analyses of the pol and env recombination-free datasets. Pol displayed the slowest substitution rate [2.640 × 10 − 4; 95% highest posterior density (HPD) interval 1.480 × 10 − 4, 3.768 × 10 − 4], whereas env substitution rates were comparatively faster [3.872 × 10 − 4; 95% HPD interval 1.85 × 10 − 4, 6.025 × 10 − 4].
